statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 2 \\ -15 \\ 5 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 44 \\ 7 \\ -45 \\ 20 \\ -46 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 52 \\ 9 \\ -51 \\ 28 \\ -50 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
